name: 黃昭勳
objective:
I.　　Tension, Compression, and Shear
II.　　Axially Loaded Members
III.　　Torsion
IV.　　Shear Forces and Bending Moments
V.　　Stresses in Beams
VI.　　Analysis of Stress and Strain
VII.　　Columns
schedule:
I.　　Tension, Compression, and Shear (Wks.1~2)
II.　　Axially Loaded Members (Wks.3~5)
III.　　Torsion (Wks.6~8)
IV.　　Shear Forces and Bending Moments (Wks.10~11)
V.　　Stresses in Beams (Wks.12~14)
VI.　　Analysis of Stress and Strain (Wks.15~17)
VII*.　　Columns (Optional)
scorePolicy:
Homework and quizzes: 30%
Midterm: 30%
Final: 40%

* Students fail to pass either midterm or final exam will be 
  automatically flunked in this class.
materials: James M. Gere,”Mechanics of Materials,” 6th edition.
